content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetPurgeStatus path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/purge/{purge_id} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name purgeid
desc a cdn purge id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum get purge status
responses
200
cdngetpurgestatusresponse
type obj
progress
type num
format float
desc the purge requests progress ranging from 00 to 10
desc the response from a request to retrieve the status of a purge request
title: 18_Purge Content_GetPurgeStatus_102.json
